q_en: What materials were used in Olivia's order?

steps.sql: SELECT DISTINCT m.name FROM materials m JOIN product_material pm ON m.id = pm.material_id JOIN order_product op ON pm.product_id = op.product_id JOIN orders o ON op.order_id = o.id JOIN customers c ON o.user_id = c.id WHERE c.customer_name = 'Olivia';
steps.description: Retrieve the materials used in orders placed by the customer named Olivia by joining the relevant tables to get the order details and the associated materials.
